name: Hexa Brain Plus!
description:
Hexa Brain Plus! is a very addictive tetris style, tangram block puzzle game. Easy to play and suitable for both adults and children of all ages.
Features:
- Easy and fun to play, quickly mastered
- Ideal for both children and adults of all ages
- Over 200+ unique and fun puzzles that will keep you challenged
- Addictive and entertaining
